employees.description: The field of technology and engineering IT professional staff

footer.address: Lot 6, Nam Thanh Urban Area, Alley 1, Nguyen Thi Due Street, Yen Hoa, Cau Giay, Hanoi
footer.signup: Sign up for the news and stay up to date

scaffoldingFeature.title: Quick Scaffolding
scaffoldingFeature.description: Automate the creation of components, features, routes, selectors and sagas - and their tests - right from the CLI! Avoid fighting the glue of your code and focus on your app!

Product.title: Product
Product.content: We have strengths in mobile/web products in various fields:

Introduce.title: Culture of VIETDEFI
Introduce.content: Culture is built on the basis of people as the center, including 3 main contents with the goal of making company members happy, engaged and developing together.

Recruit.title: Recruit
Recruit.content: We always welcome talents in the field of information technology in all positions:
Recruit.contact: Please send your CV to the email address:

slide1.title: Build a comprehensive technology products ecosystem – Make our life better
slide1.content: We provide technology solutions with outstanding features to customers, in many fields: Entertainment, Education, Accommodation, Booking,…

slide2.title: Integrate core technologies: AI, IoT, Big Data, Cloud, Blockchain into products
slide2.content: AI, IoT, Big Data, Cloud, Blockchain have strong impact on technology products, help personalize content, bring the best experiences to customers

slide3.title: Creative idea - The key success
slide3.content: Enhance the creativeness in producing to catch the digitalization trend and big business opportunities

visionContent.title: About us
visionContent.content: Vietdefi - stands for Vietnam Definition. We are an IT company. Our goal is building up valuable products to serve customers all around the world. And, affirming the position of Vietnamese products as well as the capacity and bravery of Vietnamese people in the international arena is the company's mission.

vision.title: Vision
vision.subtitle: We aim to create technology products that make life easier. We focus on building products, improving quality, and patiently waiting for market acceptance.

story.title: We are VIETDEFI
story.description: Vietdefi - stands for Vietnam Definition. We are an IT company. Our goal is building up valuable products to serve customers all around the world. And, affirming the position of Vietnamese products as well as the capacity and bravery of Vietnamese people in the international arena is the company's mission.
story.quote: “Work to live, live to be happy.”

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: The company aims at products that apply information technology to make life easier for customers. We focus on building products, improving quality, and patiently waiting for market acceptance. The company's center is human resources and products, we prioritize all resources for the above two core factors. Believing that good people create good products will definitely succeed.

product.title: Product
product.subtitle: Create the best product with all our capabilities.
product.description: We focus on building useful products for the market, bringing benefits to customers.

human.title: Human
human.subtitle: Employees are the foundation of every successful
human.description: Our staff always have the ability to think creatively, flexibly handle problems, accurately perceive the target to complete the tasks.

culture.title: Our culture
culture.subtitle1: Whether you can do it or not, whether you are happy or sad, be yourself.
culture.subtitle2: Be ourselves first and share it with everyone, we will see each other's strengths and weak- nesses so that we can support each other in our work.
culture.subtitle3: The members of the company must have a spirit of solidarity, be ready to protect each other, and work together towards the company’s goal.

box1.title: Effective working environment
box1.description: We provide a spacious space, filled with natural light and modern equipment. All to help you feel free to be creative.

box2.title: Attractive salary and bonus
box2.description: We have prepared enough financial resources to operate for at least the next 5 years. We are not in a hurry to make a profit, but will always choose financially safe moves.

box3.title: Development opportunities
box3.description: The people here always have the ability to think creatively, flexibly handle problems, accurately perceive the target to solve the job easily.

joining.title: Let's create value together
joining.description: Become part of the VIETDEFI family to create great products and meet fun colleagues

Banner.Title: Join with us
Banner.Subtitle: We don't care much about your inherent experience. The important thing is that you are an inquisitive person who knows how to get up after each failure or not. Working at VIETDEFI will be hard work, but what you get in return is totally worth it.

Introduce.title: Join with us
Introduce.item_1_content: Work experience is not very important at VIETDEFI. We appreciate creativeness and willingness to learn.
Introduce.item_2_content: Our talented leaders are always ready to support you, suggest solutions and validate your work.
Introduce.item_3_content: Clear career ladder & opportunities (intern, fresher, junior, senior, leader, C-level) - we focus on your development.
Introduce.item_4_content: We always appreciate your abilities, encourage your creation and recognize your hard work.
Introduce.item_5_content: Your happiness is at the center. We create a comfort workplace where you can feel happy and work productively.
Introduce.item_6_content: Labor contract with Health insurance and Social insurance. Salary review each 3 months. 13rd-month salary bonus.

productPage.title: Technology makes life easier
productPage.subtitle: Our goal is developing a tech products ecosystem which can serve customers in variety fields in life.

Gochie.title: Gochie
Gochie.subtitle: Wanna make life funnier? Let’s download Gochie and enjoy lots of exciting games. You can play individual games and get Gochie coins, or battle with other players and earn valuable vouchers.
Gochie.subtitl2: Simultaneously, shop can promote your own brand by create your shop and uploading voucher on Gochie

EarlyBird.title: EarlyBird
EarlyBird.subtitle: A comprehensive english learning solution for 4-8 year-old children
EarlyBird.list2: Using StudyPlay method to encourage desire to learn
EarlyBird.list3: Personalize content in order that courses are fitted to each child’s ability
EarlyBird.list4: Support parents to track children’s learning progress
